Ok, roger that.

> 
> Anyone else have their IR icons appear as black (i.e. the thumnails show just black, featureless shapes)?

Do you use ATM? If yes, please add this to the OVERRIDE section in the *ActiveTextureManagement/ActiveTextureManagementConfigs/MagicSmokeIndustries* file:

    MagicSmokeIndustries/Parts/.*{    compress = true    mipmaps = true    scale = 1    max_size = 0}

and delete the *ActiveTextureManagement/textureCache/MagicSmokeIndustries* folder.

At least it worked for me.

The new editor for positions makes absolutely no sense. I keep trying to type in max limits, and it CHANGES THE CURRENT ANGLE OF THE PART. Then, I need to recalibrate the limits to the "new" angles---which changes them AGAIN! Not only that, but it won't let me set, say, the minimum angle to "90" and the max to "180"--I have to change 360 to 260 then to 280 and finally to 180. Please, please, fix this. It's stupid and frustrating.

Unfortunately, that is beyond our reach due to the way Unity GUI works. You can try to set the limits via right-click menu first, and then fine tune the angles without deleting the characters. Actually you can avoid typing in values completely.
